title: Riot Explain why i must LOSE LP over ur CLIENT
body: Ok... so i have tried it all and this client still bugs the FREAK** out and i lose lp or i get a leaver buster.. i dont leave games or afk or dc i dont do that crap .... i play fair and i dont BS.. other peoples time.. i have lost a crap ton of LP even my promos because of this.... ive ran the repair tool ive completely reinstalled it twice... ive reinstalled windows 10 once and nothing i update my video cards my visual c++ ive tried it all RIOT WOULD U EXPLAIN THIS ... why the hell should i suffer.? well not just me many others are having this same issue... And plz dont give me that connection CRAP... ive tested it ive been thru ur help desk... ive switched to my direct connection no wifi... it still dont fix that... so no dont give me that load of BS.. the fact is this crap didnt start till a few patches ago... when hextech came in... so no... things didnt just bug out because my connection issue.. happens to me on Gig internet.. like nothings better then Google fiber here in KC so what next do i call Nasa for a Sat connection with there servers?

replies.body: I understand you're having an issue that's causing you to leave or lose games, and I know you've done some troubleshooting.  I'd like to help you out, but I need more details on the actual issue that you're having.  What's happening, where, and when?  Are you having any error messages?  Let me know in exact details, and I'd be happy to help!
